channel.title: Internals on Dkron - Distributed job scheduling system
channel.description: Recent content in Internals on Dkron - Distributed job scheduling system

item.title: Internals
item.description: This document is a WIP, it’s intended to describe the reasons that lead to design decisions in Dkron. Execution results Dkron store the result of each job execution in each node. Every time dkron executes a job it assigns it an execution group, generating a new uuid and send a serf query to target machines and waits for a response. Each target machine that will run the job, then responds with an execution object saying it started to run the job.
